Ravaging Shot.name: Ravaging Shot
Ravaging Shot.flavor: You draw from your ancestors’ insights to guide your shots.
Ravaging Shot.onHit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target gains vulnerable 5 to all damage until the end of your next turn.
Ravaging Shot.special: You can use this power as a ranged basic attack.

Bloody Despair.name: Bloody Despair
Bloody Despair.flavor: Your careful shot nudges the enemy into despair, robbing it of some of its strength.
Bloody Despair.onHit: 3[W] + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is weakened (save ends). The target takes a –5 penalty to saving throws against this effect until the end of its next turn.

Hunter's Mobility.name: Hunter's Mobility
Hunter's Mobility.flavor: An enemy’s momentary weakness gives you the chance to adjust your position.
Hunter's Mobility.trigger: An enemy you can see is bloodied by an attack
